channel.title: Day Z Mod
channel.description:
Game required: Arma
http://www.dayzmod.com/
*removed my shitty review
P.S. This is a very good commentary of the game http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KRpPIyJDSEQ

item.title: Day Z Mod
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

Ambokile:

Exams over, anyone want to play? I’d rather play a nice slow server where it takes a while to get cool stuff. That feature where you can remove vehicle parts from vehicles would be nice, too.

I’ll play some dayz add my skype (live:2012scapeofficial)

Read full topic

item.title: Day Z Mod
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:323, topic:442690”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=545375.msg4363971#msg4363971 date=1379284361]

Epoch is the best mod ever created and everyone should play it now.

What’s the difference? Do you still play GITS btw?

Have you seen Rust? It’s similar to that. Epoch has currency, trading outposts, side missions, a great base building system that allows you to build freely unlike origins, it’s amazing. I don’t really play GITS much, I’m -127k humanity on it so I’m not really proud of that lol.
[/quote]

Sounds pretty cool I’ll download it and check it out. I don’t really play GITS that much either anymore, only when I’m bored[/quote]

It’s more entertaining than vanilla DayZ. There’s so much more to do it’s unbelievable, you’ll never really get bored.

Tom:

What a hacker

umadnerd

Read full topic

item.title: Day Z Mod
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Just played DayZero on the Billy Mays server. Ran into 3 people, one of them died from zombies, another accidentally ran off the top of the school building after blood bagging me, and the other hasn’t been seen in a while. Server is restarting in about 10 minutes so I got off.

I happened to get sorta geared up just by raiding electro. Bizon with 2 mags. Silenced Machine Pistol with 4 mags. Found a few wire fencing kits, tons of food, upgraded to an alice pack, and the guy who died from zombies pretty much dropped all the tools I need (hatchet, map, binos, compass, etc). I kinda just walked around electro for 40 minutes with my mic on randomly talking to myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Day Z Mod
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:310, topic:442690”]Damn them for pointing their guns at you! Hell, do they even have a choice? I doubt I’m the only one who always forgets how to lower their weapon which nobody is dumb enough to do anyway because it leaves you all vulnerable to another party. So you pretty much shot a group of trustworthy people because they were looking at you (“pointing their guns”)

You’ve pretty much just stated why nobody works together in DayZ, the bad mechanics and lack of reasoning to do so. You either point your gun in your friends face until distrust builds up and he shoots you, or don’t point it anywhere and get shot by Bob the Bandit on the way out. I don’t judge though, I would of shot them even if they weren’t pointing their guns at me.[/quote]

I didn’t really trust them. Both had bandit skins and made a sarcastic joke on the way there about stealing the heli from me. If it was just a noob then I’d have considered that maybe he was doing it by accident but these guys seemed a bit off to me (as cool as they were)

It was on a PVP server too

Read full topic
